directive.name: FILLVALUE
directive.title: Change the default _f_i_l_l _v_a_l_u_e for PAD and ALIGN

directive.name: ORG
directive.title: Set _o_ri_gin if it hasn't been assigned yet, otherwise will function like PAD

directive.name: PAD
directive.title: _P_a_d memory from current address to the specified address with FILLVALUE

illegalopcode.name: ANE
illegalopcode.title: _A_nd X register with accumulator but _exact operation unknown

illegalopcode.name: ARR
illegalopcode.title: _And byte with accumulator then _rotate one bit _right in accumulator

illegalopcode.name: DCP
illegalopcode.title: _De_crement memory by one and com_pare with memory
illegalopcode.addressing: Zero Page; Zero Page,X; Absolute; Absolute,X; Absolute,Y;(Indirect,X); (Indirect),Y

illegalopcode.name: ISB
illegalopcode.title: _Increase memory by one, then _subtract memory from accumulator (with _borrow)
illegalopcode.addressing: Zero Page; Zero Page,X; Absolute; Absolute,X; Absolute,Y;(Indirect,X); (Indirect),Y

illegalopcode.name: LAS
illegalopcode.title: _Load _accumulator, X register and _stack pointer with with memory anded stack pointer

illegalopcode.name: LAX
illegalopcode.title: _Load _accumulator and _X register with memory
illegalopcode.addressing: Zero Page; Zero Page,Y; Absolute; Absolute,Y;(Indirect,X);(Indirect),Y

illegalopcode.name: LXA
illegalopcode.title: And byte with accumulator, then _load value into _X register and _accumulator

illegalopcode.name: RLA
illegalopcode.title: _Rotate one bit _left in memory, then and _accumulator with memory
illegalopcode.addressing: Zero Page; Zero Page,X; Absolute; Absolute,X; Absolute,Y;(Indirect,X); (Indirect),Y

illegalopcode.name: RRA
illegalopcode.title: _Rotate one bit _right in memory, then add memory to _accumulator (with carry)
illegalopcode.addressing: Zero Page; Zero Page,X; Absolute; Absolute,X; Absolute,Y;(Indirect,X); (Indirect),Y

illegalopcode.name: SBX
illegalopcode.title: _Subtract _byte from _X register (without borrow) after X register anded with the accumulator and store result in X register

illegalopcode.name: SHA
illegalopcode.title: _Store (don't know what _H is for) X register anded with _accumulator anded with 7

illegalopcode.name: SHS
illegalopcode.title: And X register with accumulator and move to stack pointer. _Store _high byte of the target address of the argument +1 anded with _stack pointer

illegalopcode.name: SHX
illegalopcode.title: _Store _high byte of the target address of the argument +1 anded with _X register

illegalopcode.name: SHY
illegalopcode.title: _Store _high byte of the target address of the argument +1 anded with _Y register

illegalopcode.name: SLO
illegalopcode.title: _Shift _left one bit in memory, then _or accumulator with memory
illegalopcode.addressing: Zero Page; Zero Page,X; Absolute; Absolute,X; Absolute,Y; (Indirect,X); (Indirect),Y

illegalopcode.name: SRE
illegalopcode.title: _Shift _right one bit in memory, then _eor accumulator with memory
illegalopcode.addressing: Zero Page; Zero Page,X; Absolute; Absolute,X; Absolute,Y;(Indirect,X);(Indirect),Y
